Sentencas: An electrochemical model for degradation of solid oxide electrolyzer cells is presented.
Titulo: Mechanism of oxygen electrode delamination in solid oxide electrolyzer cells

Sentencas: The model is based on concepts in local thermodynamic equilibrium in systems otherwise in global thermodynamic non-equilibrium.
Titulo: Mechanism of oxygen electrode delamination in solid oxide electrolyzer cells

Sentencas: It is shown that electronic conduction through the electrolyte, however small, must be taken into account for determining local oxygen chemical potential, mu(O2), within the electrolyte.
Titulo: Mechanism of oxygen electrode delamination in solid oxide electrolyzer cells

Sentencas: The mu(O2), within the electrolyte may lie out of bounds in relation to values at the electrodes in the electrolyzer mode.
Titulo: Mechanism of oxygen electrode delamination in solid oxide electrolyzer cells

Sentencas: Under certain conditions, high pressures can develop in the electrolyte just near the oxygen electrode/electrolyte interface, leading to oxygen electrode delamination.
Titulo: Mechanism of oxygen electrode delamination in solid oxide electrolyzer cells

Sentencas: These predictions are in accord with the reported literature on the subject.
Titulo: Mechanism of oxygen electrode delamination in solid oxide electrolyzer cells

Sentencas: Development of high pressures may be avoided by introducing some electronic conduction in the electrolyte.
Titulo: Mechanism of oxygen electrode delamination in solid oxide electrolyzer cells
